casebody.data:
SILVER, et al.
v.
The HALIFAX COUNTY BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS 338A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 27, 2017 Mark Dorosin, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth M. Haddix, Attorney at Law, Pittsboro, Eileen O'Connor, Attorney at Law, Allen Buansi, Attorney at Law, for Silver, LaTonya, et al. Brent Ducharme, Attorney at Law. Garris Neil Yarborough, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, Glynn Rollins, Attorney at Law, Roanoke Rpds, for The Halifax County Board Of Commissioners. K. Ricky Watson, Jr., Co-Director of Youth Justice Project.

Peggy Nicholson, Attorney at Law.

Seth Ascher

Jennifer Story

George Hausen, Jr., Legal Aid.

Jennifer W. Marsh, Director of Research.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of November 2017 by Plaintiffs for Withdrawal and Substitution of Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of November 2017."
